headline: Yum! Brands (YUM): Has the Recent Pullback Opened a Valuation Opportunity?
summary: Yum! Brands (YUM) has been treading water lately, with the stock slipping over the past week and month even as its longer term returns and steady revenue and earnings growth continue to look respectable. See our latest analysis for Yum! Brands. The recent pullback, including a 1 day share price return of negative 0.62 percent and a weaker 1 year total shareholder return of 7.36 percent, suggests momentum is cooling a bit, even though longer term compounding remains solid.
